fullCourseName: HAMK Remote Mobile Robot Lab: Demo Course (ESP32 + MicroPython)
shortDescription: Try the limited-access demo of HAMK’s 24/7 ESP32 robot lab and script MicroPython control, sensing, and autonomy remotely.
fullDescription: Experience the limited-access demo of HAMK’s always-on mobile robotics laboratory and drive a real ESP32-powered differential-drive robot over Wi‑Fi. The platform pairs MicroPython firmware with motor drivers, encoders, line sensors, and LEDs on a modular chassis that runs on a camera-monitored test track. You’ll learn to script movement, read sensors, stream telemetry, tune PID line-following, and deploy remote experiments confidently from anywhere.
requirements: No previous programming or robotics knowledge is required.
